description: Grok Control schema describes how to run the experiment in the Grok environment.

environment.description: Describes the context in which the model is being run

iterationCount.description: An optional limit on the number of iterations a model performs

iterationCountInferOnly.description: Optional. If specified, the last iterationCountInferOnly iterations will be done with learning off

inferenceArgs.description: A dictionary with supplemental arguments required for inference

loggedMetrics.description: Sequence of regular expressions specifying which metrics should be logged along with predictions

metrics.description: Sequence of regular expressions specifying which metrics should be logged along with predictions
